revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: (Col.) 17;;(Mecheir 15, continued);Sambas, son of Sokmenis and Tkollainis, grandson of Sambas: 4 drachmai; column 69;Herieus the younger, son of Horos and Thaesis, grandson of Pnepheros: 8 drachmai; column 80;Pnepheros, son of Pnepheros and Tapetheus, grandson of Pnepheros: 8 drachmai; column 82;Didymos, son of Satabous and Tanomgeus, grandson of Pakysis: 4 drachmai 28 obols; column 84;Ninis, son of Asklas and Tabous, grandson of Ninis: 4 drachmai; column 88;Ouetis, son of Petheus and Taseus, grandson of Pnepheros: 16 drachmai; column 88;Dioskoros, son of Aiaus and Thases, grandson of Orsenouphis: 8 drachmai; column 95;Pasion, son of Petheus and Zoidous, grandson of Kames: 24 drachmai 28 obols; column 51;Total for the day: 288 drachmai 24 obols;;On the 16th, similarly:;Satabous, son of Petheus and Tapetaus, grandson of Satabous: 4 drachmai; column 1;Horos the younger, son of Hatres and Teraus, grandson of Horos: 4 drachmai; column 2;Aphrodisios, son of Petheus and Taseus, grandson of Pnepheros: 8 drachmai; column 3;Heron, son of Pekmeis also called Heuremon and Taseus: 12 drachmai 28 obols; column 6;Ptolemaios, son of Phanomgeus and Tapsais, grandson of Phanomgeus: 16 drachmai; column 8;Petoraipis, son of Hatres and Soeris, grandson of Imouthes: 4 drachmai; column 9;Pnepheros, son of Petaus and Thaesis, grandson of Pnepheros: 12 drachmai 28 obols; column 11;Petheus, son of Sokmenis and Thaesis, grandson of Sokmenis: 8 drachmai; column 17;Orsenouphis, son of Heron and Zoidous, grandson of Orsenouphis: 8 drachmai; column 23;Ammonis, son of Ammonios and Tninis, grandson of Ammonios: 8 drachmai; column 26;Heron, son of Petheus and Taorsenouphis, grandson of Kollouthos: 4 drachmai; column 27;Herakles, son of Sokrates and Tapetheus, grandson of Phasis: 8 drachmai; column 29;Herakles, son of Petaus and Segathis, grandson of Orsenouphis: 8 drachmai; column 31;Petheus also called Karanos, son of Sokmenis and Tasokmenis, grandson of Sokmenis: 8 drachmai; column 32;Petheus, son of Herakles and Didyme, grandson of Petheus: 12 drachmai; column 45;Total for the day: 128 drachmai 26 obols;;On the 17th, similarly:;Petaus, son of Petheus and Tapasion, grandson of Petaus: 12 drachmai 27 obols; column 34;Komon, son of Pnepheros and Tkollathis, grandson of Satabous: 12 drachmai 26 obols; column 37;Teos, son of Petheus and Taonnophris, grandson of Teos: 4 drachmai 19 obols; column 39;Pasoknopais, son of Phasis and Tanomgeus, grandson of Esouris: 4 drachmai; column 42

listBibl.bibl: Youtie HC, PMich IV/1, 225, col. 17 (l. 116-174), 1936 -- L. 147: read 28 obols, instead of 27 obols. (PH)
